requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 or Intel i5-3570
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel i7-3770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 580 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 or Intel i5-3570
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
